description:
Lucemon is elected the new president of Heaven Zone, but the citizens` hopes for peace are quickly betrayed. The moment Lucemon is presented with the armband that symbolizes the presidency, he reveals the evil true nature he had been hiding all along! He uses an incantation to split the Zone and release the airborne shrine in which the Code Crown was sealed. Once he obtains the Code Crown, he returns to his true evil form and reveals that he is a servant of Lilithmon. The stunned Taiki is then faced with the appearance of Nene and a dark knight Digimon...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 黒騎士デジモン, 参上!
